name: STEPHEN J. R. v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
name_abbreviation: Stephen J. R. v. Comm'r of Corr.

parties:
STEPHEN J. R.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
attorneys: The petitioner Stephen J. R.'s petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 1, 173 A.3d 984 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
STEPHEN J. R.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided January 3, 2018
Robert L. O'Brien, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.
Demise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.
The petitioner Stephen J. R.'s petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 1, 173 A.3d 984 (2017), is denied.
MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
